newsitem.title: USA: Clinton to attend EU summit at The Hague.
newsitem.headline: Clinton to attend EU summit at The Hague.

text.p: President Clinton will participate in a summit with European Union leaders in the Netherlands in May, the White House said on Friday.
White House Press Secretary Mike McCurry said Clinton would meet with EU leaders for talks in the Hague on May 28-29. He was expected to visit other European countries during his trip, McCurry said.
